member.name: T:Albatross.CodeGen.UnitTest.Mocking.ContactTable
member.summary:
create the following table by mocking the following interfaces: IGetTableColumns, IGetTableIdentityColumn, IGetTablePrimaryKey
create table test.Contact( ContactID int identity(1,1) not null, constraint UQ_Contact_SyID unique(SyID),
Domain varchar(100), Login varchar(100), constraint PK_Contact primary key clustered (Domain, Login),
FirstName nvarchar(100) not null, LastName nvarchar(100) not null, MiddleName nvarchar(100),
Gender char not null, Cell varchar(50), Address nvarchar(200),
Created datetime not null, CreatedBy varchar(100) not null, Modified datetime not null, ModifiedBy varchar(100) not null, )

member.name: T:Albatross.CodeGen.UnitTest.Mocking.SymbolTable
member.summary:
create the following table by mocking the following interfaces: IGetTableColumns, IGetTableIdentityColumn, IGetTablePrimaryKey
create table Symbol( SyID int identity(1,1) not null, constraint UQ_Symbol_SyID unique(SyID),
SyCode varchar(100) not null, constraint PK_Symbol_SyCode primary key clustered (SyCode),
CuID int not null, OutShares bigint not null, CoID int not null, SnID int, )
